thread.title: Mia Love At March For Life: ‘Each Child, Born And Unborn, Has The Potential To Open Up Our World’
thread.title_full: Mia Love At March For Life: ‘Each Child, Born And Unborn, Has The Potential To Open Up Our World’

author: Jim Treacher
title: Mia Love At March For Life: ‘Each Child, Born And Unborn, Has The Potential To Open Up Our World’
text:
TOP 5448242 
This speech is terrific, and I agree with every word. This is why I believe federally funded abortion on demand is wrong. I’m glad Mia Love is here, and I’m glad you’re here too. I may not agree with you, or even like you, but I’m glad you were given a chance to live your life. What you do with it is up to you.
